title: Full Stack Web Developement
description: Building responsive and scalable websites using modern frontend (React, Next.js) and backend (Node.js, Express) technologies.
dialogDescription: I build modern, scalable, and fully responsive web applications using a MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) and Next.js for SSR and performance optimization. From design to deployment, I ensure seamless frontend-backend integration, and mobile responsiveness.
highlight3: Database Management: MySQL, MongoDB, Prisma ORM
highlight4: Deployment: Vercel, Netlify, and custom cloud hosting

title: AI Integration
description: Embedding AI features in website like chatbots, recommendation systems, and automation using tools like OpenAI.
dialogDescription: I integrate AI capabilities such as OpenAI-powered chatbots, recommendation systems, and content automation into websites and apps. This enhances user interaction and engagement using state-of-the-art APIs and ML models.

title: RESTful API Development
description: Designing and developing secure, high-performance APIs for web applications.
dialogDescription: I specialize in designing scalable and secure RESTful APIs for frontend-backend communication, enabling seamless data flow and secure CRUD operations. Built with Express.js, validated with Zod, and secured with proper headers and authentication.

title: Database Management
description: Structuring and managing databases using MongoDB, MySQL, and Supabase.
dialogDescription: I design, optimize, and manage structured and unstructured databases with proper indexing, schema design, and relationship handling. Using tools like Prisma ORM for efficiency and Firebase for real-time data sync.

title: UI/UX Design Implementation
description: Creating pixel-perfect, user-friendly interfaces based on Figma designs using Tailwind CSS and responsive frameworks.
dialogDescription: I bring UI/UX designs to life using responsive, pixel-perfect code. Whether it's a custom design from Figma or a concept in your mind, I use modern CSS frameworks and accessibility best practices to deliver sleek, user-focused interfaces.
highlight1: Tools: Figma to Code, Adobe XD

title: Authentication & Security
description: Implementing secure login systems with JWT, OAuth, Google Sign-In, Next-auth, and role-based access control.
dialogDescription: I implement robust authentication flows using JWT, OAuth, and social login options like Google Sign-In. I ensure protected routes, token storage strategies, and role-based access control using modern libraries like NextAuth and Firebase Auth.
